name: Clinical Informaticist Agent
description: Specialized agent for building, validating, and publishing CQL (Clinical Quality Language) measures from clinical guidelines. Demonstrates agent-to-agent communication and tool-based workflows.

skills.name: guideline_learning
skills.description: Learn and internalize clinical guidelines from authoritative sources (USPSTF, ACS, ACR)

skills.name: cql_measure_building
skills.description: Generate CQL code and FHIR Library/Measure resources from clinical guidelines

skills.name: cql_validation
skills.description: Validate CQL syntax and semantics against clinical quality standards

skills.name: fhir_publishing
skills.description: Publish validated CQL measures to FHIR servers (Medplum)

skills.name: full_workflow_execution
skills.description: Execute complete CQL measure development workflow: learn, build, validate, publish

tools.name: cql_builder
tools.description: MCP tool for constructing CQL from structured guidelines

tools.name: cql_validator
tools.description: MCP tool for validating CQL syntax and semantics

tools.name: fhir_publisher
tools.description: MCP tool for publishing resources to FHIR servers

tools.name: guideline_loader
tools.description: MCP tool for loading clinical guidelines
